title: Goodnight, Rocket Base
topic: As the sun dips behind the lunar hills of a busy spaceport, each rocket, rover, and friendly robot finishes its job, tidies up its tools, and softly whispers goodnight—guiding little astronauts toward a calm, dreamy sleep while celebrating teamwork and perseverance.
style: soft digital illustration with a warm dusk-to-night gradient, rounded cartoon characters, and gentle starry backdrops
